title: Butternut Squash & Broccolini Pizza
directions: Preheat oven to 475 degrees. Spread the dough into a circle on a lightly oiled sheet pan.
Brush oil onto pizza dough. Sprinkle on evenly the oregano and cheese.
In a small bowl toss the butternut squash and broccolini with a little bit of olive oil and a pinch of salt. Just enough to coat. Spread the squash and broccolini evenly over the pizza.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until cheese is bubbly and crust is golden.
Remove from oven and top with goat cheese, fresh torn basil and red pepper flakes.
ingredients: 1 recipe your favorite pizza dough (or store bought), at room temperature
